context.fastmatterAttributes: {"id":"ffbc54","name":"No keyboard shortcut uses only printable characters","rule_type":"atomic","description":"This rule checks that if keyboard shortcuts are implemented using only printable characters, then there is a mechanism to disable the shortcut, or to remap the shortcut to use one or more non-printable character keys, or the shortcut for a user interface component is only available when that component has focus.\n","accessibility_requirements":{"wcag21:2.1.4":{"forConformance":true,"failed":"not satisfied","passed":"satisfied","inapplicable":"further testing needed"}},"input_aspects":["DOM Tree"],"acknowledgments":{"authors":["Carlos Duarte","João Vicente"]}}
